replies.msg:
Adhell 暫被收皮, 各種替代方案:

純粹擋廣告:
- 本身用緊adhell: 唔好刪app, 唔好改設定! elm key就算過咗期都可以繼續用

- Android 9用戶 (s10系列全部都係): 喺settings入面Set Private DNS 做 "dns.adguard.com"

- 用Adguard: https://adguard.com/en/welcome.html

- 用 Blokada: https://blokada.org/

- 用DNS66: https://f-droid.org/packages/org.jak_linux.dns66/

- No adhell and still on Nougat or Oreo? Grab Intra and set the DNS to "https://dns.adguard.com/dns-query". Just relax and have a pleasant day.

- Want more control over what you block? Use a VPN such as VPN Hosts which supports wildcards and local hosts file. Just relax and have a pleasant day.

Ref: https://forum.xda-developers.com/showpost.php?p=79389398&postcount=421

測試對比了S10，一加7 Pro，Note10（9825處理器）的Androbench成績，結果很吃驚.Note10的連續讀取1486MB / s，連續寫入586MB / s，是目前已知 UFS3.0手機裡最高的，隨機讀取184MB / s，隨機寫入這裡炸了，居然達到了192MB / s，對比了一加7pro，同樣是UFS3.0，只有29，Galaxy Fold也是UFS3.0 ，這項成績是30，而S10只有23，即便P30 Pro也只有163MB / s。
不止如此最後三個SQLite的成績更是爆炸，差不多比折翻了一倍。
懷疑note10在文件系統方面有所改動。
